2 Sizes of Claw Machine Plush Toys?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2001 Topics (Year Of The Heart Crystal): 2 Sizes of Claw Machine Plush Toys?
By Lisa Shock on Thursday, February 1, 2001 - 10:03 am:

I just got myself another Golem plush, and while it has the same tag as my first one, it's much smaller. My first one is about 12" high from head to toe standing up, the new one is a little over 8½". Has anyone else seen various sizes in these?

By Lisa Shock on Thursday, March 28, 2002 - 09:30 pm:

Just an added note for the record: I just got Hare and Mocchi plushes from ebay, and they are the claw machine toys, but both are much smaller than the ones I got a year ago!
